pros: Because it is one of the only palces to work in the county.
cons: They dont take care of their employees.  Of all the people I spoke to there no one was satisfied with how they were treated by the "higher ups" as they would call them.

review_title: A great place to work; a fantastic place for a new nurse to start and a seasoned nurse to grow in their practice.
pros: Training in multipe departments is excellent. Coworkers are very friendly and eager to teach new skills and we work great as a team. Education oppurtunities are always available and encouraged. Management is willing to work around your schedule. I enjoy working for Memorial Hospital of Texas County.
cons: Manangement is always changing. There is a lack of communication from manangement to the other departments, as well as inner-departmental communication. Some policies are vague, or differ from department to department. However, this is improving.

pros: Great place to work, wish more people can take advantage of the facility
cons: It is a county supported hospital. County is trying to support.

pros: A good hospital service fro the small town.
cons: Wish more people can come through to take advantage of the hospital.
